Posts.Content: Hi toxophilite,Â  Yes I had fec-t and finished a week ago. My eye lashes fell out around my 4th-5th treatment I was hoping I'd got away with it. I also lost more hair as didn't wear the cold cap for the last two sessions. Fingers crossed that they come back in the next couple of month's thanks for getting back to me X x
Posts.Title: Last chemo & hair regrowth

Posts.Content: Hi Lin Thanks for getting back to me. That's great to hear that your feeling good. I can't wait to start getting back to some sort of normality tho I will be having surgery at the end of the month. Fingers crossed we will have lushes lashes and brows very soon X x
Posts.Title: Last chemo & hair regrowth

Posts.Content: Hi guys I've just finished my last chemo session. I'm so pleased as there were times where I didn't think I'd make it. The last 4 weeks I've lost my eye lashes and eye brows and was wondering if anyone had an idea of when they may start to grow back? and my hair too? X x
